value:
In a contest of strength, that wretch
Nifl would stand no chance! I would
hurl her off the edge of this world!

You are no more than beasts. You
understand that? Fight the hardest,
and you live! ...Sounds ideal to me!

I could get used to clothes like this.
Jangling, dangling armor gets in the
way. This, however...just right.

Why don't you set that divine weapon
of yours aside and fight me with your
own two hands, huh?!

Hah! Even if they attacked all
together, I will yield to no gaggle
of fresh-sprouted weaklings!

You're $Nu?$k$pI am here to challenge you to
a contest of strength, in place
of $Nf!

Let it be burned into your mind
just how the god of flame fights!

Show your face and I'll reduce
you to ashes!
What?! Absurd...

Now this is something I can find
a use for!

You have some guts to call upon
Múspell, the great god of flame.
I will light this world ablaze!

I still have fight left in me. Show me
my next opponent already!$k$pI want the beast that remains once
you burn away the love, peace, and
all that other worthless prattle.$k$pA beast fights or dies. If you do not
fight, you cannot survive. A bizarre
twist of fate, to be sure!$k$pRejoice! You are in luck! Life without
struggle has no value—fight to create
a meaning for your worthless life!$k$pIf you refuse to fight, you are
already dead.$k$pSo, why not show me to my next
opponent while you still have life
left in you? The festival rolls on!
A fool approaches!
Ha! What is this?
Enough sniveling.
Become ash by my hand!
Unbelievable...
Haha! Why is every festival not more like this one?!
Huh?! Stick your hand in an open flame, would you?
No guts shall go unspilled!
You dare hold me up against such pathetic mortals?
You will scream and struggle like the beasts you mortals are!
Damn that Nifl. We will settle things here...
Behold! My glory brands your eyes with my image!
*grunt*
Out with it!
Stomp them out.
